name: coder
description: Coder is an enterprise-ready developer workspace management platform that lets teams run cloud-based VS Code and JetBrains environments. It supports infrastructure provisioning and integrates with AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
features: Cloud Workspaces: Run VS Code and JetBrains IDEs in the cloud. Code from anywhere.
Infrastructure Provisioning: Automated setup with Terraform integration. Consistent environments every time.
Enterprise Ready: Built for teams with security and compliance features. Scale with confidence.
Multi-Cloud Support: Deploy on AWS, GCP, Azure, or Kubernetes. Choose your infrastructure.
Resource Management: Control compute resources and costs efficiently. Optimize spending automatically.
Team Collaboration: Share workspaces and standardize development environments. Everyone stays in sync.
